short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy the current page's title and URL with one click.
short.zh_CN: 一键复制当前页面的标题和链接。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Markdown Title & URL Copier is a lightweight and handy Chrome extension that lets you instantly copy the title and URL of the current webpage as a Markdown-formatted link with just one click. Simplify your content curation, note-taking, or research process by quickly generating Markdown links for your favorite websites, blog posts, or articles with this easy-to-use browser extension.
long.zh_CN: Markdown标题与链接复制器是一款轻巧实用的Chrome插件，只需一键即可快速将当前网页的标题和链接复制为Markdown格式的链接。使用这款易用的浏览器扩展，轻松生成Markdown链接，简化您的内容整理、笔记记录或研究过程，让您更便捷地收藏喜欢的网站、博客文章或在线资源。
